data.event: Since last reported, the flooding in Pakistan has spread and has now struck more than four million people.

event.title: yesterday, and from Sindh province, where the flood is expected

data.event: Army and government forces have rushed to evacuate hundreds of thousands of people from parts of the Punjab province of Pakistan, where the disaster spread to yesterday, and from Sindh province, where the flood is expected to reach by the weekend.

event.title: affected by the floods, disease is the biggest problem now

data.event: For those affected by the floods, disease is the biggest problem now.

event.title: had been cut off for more than a week

data.event: The resort had been cut off for more than a week, according to a reporter there.
Yesterday the country promised a further 25 million dollars in aid.
